item.title: .NET
item.description: .NET: structure: runtime component languages compilers platforms: .NET Core .NET Framework Xamarin it provides definitions for a set of Base Class Libraries(BCL) APIs to be implemented by all the platforms conforming to the standard .NET Core: components: CoreCLR(Common Language Runtime): open source refactoring of the original CLR manage usage and references to objects communication and interactions of objects written in the different languages supported garbage collection components: garbage collector Just In Time(JIT) compiler Native interop: allow managed(.
